lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: encontrar (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I'm going, I'm going at dawn, to find a new love.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Eu cansei de amar sozinho e vou viver na rua
lines.translation: I'm tired of loving alone and I'm going to live on the streets.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: cansei, amar, viver (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I'm tired of loving alone and I'm going to live on the streets.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Pela madruga eu vou, encontrar um novo amor
lines.translation: In the early morning I'll go, to find a new love.

lines.text: Eu cansei de amar sozinho, e vou comer só puta
lines.translation: I'm tired of loving alone, and I'm only going to sleep with prostitutes.

lines.text: É o Japa NK né, bebê? Bebela

lines.text: É o Japa NK, tá, vida?
